festival: ^Welcome to Valencia! Are you here for the festival?
^<color=#0079C0>Fallas</color> is an annual celebration that takes place here in Valencia in commemoration of Saint Joseph.
^It's like a huge street party! We have processions that run through the city and marching bands.
^Everyday, we have <color=#0079C0>la Mascletà</color>, which is an incredible firework display!
^It ends with <color=#0079C0>la Cremà</color>, where we burn the <color=#0079C0>falles/color>.
^They take months to make. People known as the <color=#0079C0>fallero artists</color>make them.
^<color=#0079C0>Fallero artists</color> sounds like a cool title. Is that what you are?
^It is and I wear it proudly. If you have any more questions let me know.

c-0: ^<color=#0079C0>Fallas</color> is an annual celebration that takes place here in Valencia in commemoration of Saint Joseph.
^It's like a huge street party! We have processions that run through the city and marching bands.
^Everyday, we have <color=#0079C0>la Mascletà</color>, which is an incredible firework display!
^It all ends with <color=#0079C0>la Cremà</color>, where we burn the <color=#0079C0>falles</color>.
c-1: ^It takes place between the 1st to the 19th March, but the main days take place from the 15th to the 19th.
^There's two days until it starts, so the city will be buzzing with excitement!
c-2: ^<color=#0079C0>Fallas</color> is the festival but what are <color=#0079C0>falles</color>?
^Gigantic figures made from paper, wood, wax and polystyrene.
^They take months to make. People known as the <color=#0079C0>fallero artists</color>make them.

questions: ^Would you like to know anything else?
no: ^No problem! Come back if you have any questions.
